summary: The story of the hip-hop DJ from the birth of hip-hop to the invention of scratching and "beat-juggling" vinyl, to the more recent "turntablism" movement. Underdogs and virtuosos who have radically changed the way we hear and create music.
cast: The Allies|A-Trak|Craze|D.J. Infamous|J. Smoke|Develop|Spictakular|Afrika Bambaataa|Almighty K.G.|The Beat Junkies|DJ Rhettmatic|Tommy Gunn|Melo-D|DJ Curse|Bullet Proof Space Travelers|DJ Marz|Carlos Aguilar|Eddie Def|Frank Cuevas|Dilated Peoples|Evidence|Rakaa Iriscience|DJ Craze|DJ Faust|DJ Flare|DJ Krush|DJ Relm|DJ Shadow|Shannon Ames|DJ Streak|DJ Swamp|Dot-a-Rock|Electric Boogaloos|Suga Pop|Mr. Wiggles|Fabel|Boogaloo Sam|Feedback|Gang Starr|Guru|DJ Premier|Grand Mixer DXT|Grand Wizard Theodore|Invisbl Skratch Piklz|DJ Q-Bert|Yoga Frog|Apollo|Mix Master Mike|Shortcut|Jay Slim|DJ Jazzy Jay|Jurassic 5|Chali 2na|Cut Chemist|DJ Nu-Mark|Marc 7|Soup|Akil|Kevie Kev|Klever|MB2000|Dread Archie Jr.|Emanon|Afra|Mysterio|Snayk Eyez|Steinski|Steve Dee|X-ecutioners|Mista Sinista|Rob Swift|Roc Raida|Total Eclipse|DJ Z-Trip|Billy Jam|Dave Paul|Naut Humon|Mark Herlihy|Doze Green|Jon Bernson|Glenn Alexander|Rene Zapata|Tom Boyle|Greg Riggs|Henri Cohen|John Terry|Mike Carnahan|Hans Braun|Sharon Ray|Babu|John Carluccio|Grandmaster Flash|Herbie Hancock|Brian Lucas|Christie Z. title: Scratch
